body_html: @colesbury with the TensorIterator PR, aren't we going to reduce the usage of the kernelPointwiseApply functions (for now it's only for a few ops, but I suspect that we will extend it to all pointwise ops, right?), which have many specializations?

body: @colesbury with the TensorIterator PR, aren't we going to reduce the usage of the kernelPointwiseApply functions (for now it's only for a few ops, but I suspect that we will extend it to all pointwise ops, right?), which have many specializations?
